name: Sketch Library
short_description: This package provides implementations of various sketching techniques (a.k.a. synopsis). In particular: Bloom filters, Lossy Counting, FM, AMS, Count-Min, Max-Stable and Range-Efficient sketch, Quantile Digest, Reservoir and Counting Sampling.
